segments.text: The kitchen has an open window letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink, holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's using a dish towel to dry it carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, water flowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's causing the sink to overflow onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, stacked dishes wait on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Upper cabinets are open, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs a stool to access it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby reaches up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside appears neat and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This seems like a typical busy afternoon.
segments.speaker: PAR
